chapter.title: &qemu; Overview
chapter.para: &qemu; is a fast, cross-platform Open Source machine emulator which can emulate a huge number of hardware architectures for you. &qemu; lets you run a complete unmodified operating system (&vmguest;) on top of your existing system (&vmhost;).
You can also use &qemu; for debugging purposes - you can easily stop your running virtual machine, inspect its state and save and restore it later.
